original: 四靜慮真如無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定真如無來無去亦復不住；🔽四靜慮自性無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定自性無來無去亦復不住；
analyzed: 四靜慮真如無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定真如無來無去亦復不住； 四靜慮自性無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定自性無來無去亦復不住；
translated: the true nature of the four formless concentrations has no coming, no going, and also does not abide; the true nature of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations has no coming, no going, and also does not abide;🔽the intrinsic nature of the four formless concentrations has no coming, no going, and also does not abide; the intrinsic nature of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations has no coming, no going, and also does not abide;

original: 四靜慮自相無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定自相無來無去亦復不住。
analyzed: 四靜慮自相無來無去亦復不住，四無量、四無色定自相無來無去亦復不住。
translated: the specific characteristics of the four formless concentrations have no coming, no going, and also do not abide; the specific characteristics of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations have no coming, no going, and also do not abide.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 以四靜慮、四無量、四無色定及彼本性、真如、自性、自相若動若住不可得故。
analyzed: 以四靜慮、四無量、四無色定及彼本性、真如、自性、自相若動若住不可得故。
translated: It is because the four formless concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless concentrations, as well as their intrinsic nature, true nature, intrinsic characteristics, whether moving or still, cannot be apprehended.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 四念住無來無去亦復不住，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支無來無去亦復不住；
analyzed: 四念住無來無去亦復不住，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支無來無去亦復不住；
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness have no coming, no going, and also do not abide; the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path have no coming, no going, and also do not abide;

original: 四念住本性無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支本性無來無去亦復不住；
analyzed: 四念住本性無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支本性無來無去亦復不住；
translated: The intrinsic nature of the four establishments of mindfulness does not come or go, and also does not abide; the intrinsic nature of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path, does not come or go, and also does not abide;

original: 四念住真如無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支真如無來無去亦復不住；🔽四念住自性無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支自性無來無去亦復不住；
analyzed: 四念住真如無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支真如無來無去亦復不住； 四念住自性無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支自性無來無去亦復不住；
translated: the true suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness does not come or go, and also does not abide; the true suchness of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path, does not come or go, and also does not abide;🔽the self-nature of the four establishments of mindfulness does not come or go, and also does not abide; the self-nature of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path, does not come or go, and also does not abide;

original: 四念住自相無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支自相無來無去亦復不住。
analyzed: 四念住自相無來無去亦復不住，四正斷乃至八聖道支自相無來無去亦復不住。
translated: the specific characteristics of the four establishments of mindfulness do not come or go, and also do not abide; the specific characteristics of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path, do not come or go, and also do not abide.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 以四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支及彼本性、真如、自性、自相若動若住不可得故。
analyzed: 以四念住、四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支及彼本性、真如、自性、自相若動若住不可得故。
translated: Because the four establishments of mindfulness, four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path, as well as their intrinsic nature, true suchness, self-nature, and specific characteristics, whether moving or still, cannot be apprehended.

original: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第五十八
analyzed: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第五十八
translated: Mahāprajñāpāramitā-sūtra, Scroll 58
